title: Can't log in to the Docker Hub
content:
When you run the downloadimages.sh script to download the container images, you receive a "Cannot log in to the Docker Hub" error message.

Cause

This issue occurs because the HTTP/HTTPS proxy is incorrectly configured.

Solution

Run the following command to make sure the host HTTP proxy is correctly configured before you run the downloadimages.sh script.
export http_proxy=<http_proxy> https_proxy=<https_proxy>
For example:
export http_proxy=https://web-proxy.myproxy.com:1234 https_proxy=http://web-proxy.myproxy.com:1234
